subtitle: Review adventure
title: Adventurous walk with the youngsters
description: The first hike with the ksa group has just been completed. It was very fun and educational for the members aged 12 to 14. We are very enthusiastic about the app and its possibilities.

subtitle: Review romantic
title: Romantic walking date
description: Super application! My husband loved the romantic walk! Keep up the good work with these nice routes, assignments and romantic walks and so on!

subtitle: Review serene
title: Sun, Sea, Beach
description: Great walks to completely unwind and get rid of the stress. I definitely recommend the walks by the dunes!
